basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Dipesh Khaiju.Hi! I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer with hands-on experience in building scalable web apps using Python, React, Node.js, Docker, and Azure. I'm comfortable in Linux environments, and I work confidently with Git, MongoDB, and Redis.I enjoy turning Figma designs into responsive UIs using React, Redux Toolkit, and modern UI libraries like Material UI or Tailwind. Whether it's frontend or backend, I love solving problems and writing clean, maintainable code. Always learning, always building!

projects.title: Real-time Chat App
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. A feature-rich chat application built with Socket.io for real-time communication. Users can sign up, log in, and engage in instant messaging with live updates. Implemented private and group chat functionality with a scalable backend using Node.js and Express, and styled the frontend with Tailwind CSS. MongoDB is used to store chat history and user data.

projects.title: Ecommerce App
projects.description: Personal project for study subject.A full-featured ecommerce platform where users can browse products, add items to their cart, and simulate purchases. Integrated eSewa payment gateway for secure online transactions. Built with React for the frontend, Express and Firebase for the backend services, and Tailwind CSS for a modern, responsive UI. This project showcases secure authentication, cart management, and payment processing.u

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on for my learning purposes.A lightweight weather application that provides real-time weather updates and forecasts using the OpenWeather API. Developed with React and Tailwind CSS to ensure a smooth and responsive UI. This project focused on handling API requests, managing asynchronous data flow, and delivering clean user experience across devices.
